document_data.mainbody: '''''Moonrise over Myth Drannor'''''<sup>[[[Template:Cite game/Eye of the Beholder III: Assault on Myth Drannor/Rule Book/Moonrise over Myth Drannor|citation template]]]</sup> is a short story by [[Ed Greenwood]], published by [[wikipedia:en:Strategic Simulations|Strategic Simulations, Inc.]] as a part of the video game rule book for ''[[Eye of the Beholder III: Assault on Myth Drannor]]''.
